ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(NOT(Contains(RecordType.Name, 'Master Campaign')), RecordType.Name != 'Commercial' , RecordType.Name != "Dummy Campaign", OR(
RTL_Call_End_Date__c < StartDate , RTL_Call_End_Date__c > EndDate ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The call end date cannot be later than campaign end date.
